itemLabel: Alexander Gordon, 7th Marquess of Aberdeen and Temair

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander George Gordon, 7th Marquess of Aberdeen and Temair,  (31 March 1955 – 12 March 2020) was a Scottish peer and the son of Alastair Gordon, 6th Marquess of Aberdeen and Temair.
